summary:
- **2nd Quarter Group Sales**: $192.9 million (+2.07% YoY).  
- **1st Half Group Sales**: $371.3 million (99.8% of prior year).  
- **Online Sales Share**: 19.36% of Group sales (vs. 18.77% prior year).  
- **Inventory**: Value below prior year.  
- **Expected NPAT**: Not less than $29 million for 1H.  
- **Margin Pressure**: Gross profit margin impacted by economic downturn.  
- **Half-Year Results Date**: To be released 10 September 2025 (interim dividend expected).
